title: What are the best article writing topics for class 8? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, The word writing itself is so motivating that one can make wonders if they start loving to write on any topic given. I would love to share some of the topics for the students of the 8th class to start writing the articles which not only improves their writing skills but also makes them research the topics for which they want to write. The topics list goes like this:- A Requirement of good nutrition at the young age.Playing Outdoor Games play an important role in a kid’s life.Bad effects of watching Television and playing video games.Aware of environmental changes ex:-air, water, other pollutants.Reading books is a gift to one’s Life.Hobbies and extracurricular activities .Fashion and its role in our society.Exploring neighborhood-know the routes and places nearby.Photography and its advantages.Writing about astronomy and the latest developments in the field. These are some areas where kids learn while exploring these areas. We can also expect some children developing more interest in the topics and who knows! one of them may become a professional photographer, fashion designer or an astronaut, scientist,etc., Please do comment on my article, would love to hear from you.
